subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Nets' Cliff Robinson first started wearing a headband during basketball games nearly two decades ago, before it was a fashion statement. Today, headbands are as common as high-tops and jerseys.
snippet: The Nets' Cliff Robinson first started wearing a headband during basketball games nearly two decades ago, before it was a fashion statement. Today, headbands are as common as high-tops and jerseys.
